name: Croda Beauty - SphingoCare™ Ceramides & Sphingolipids
description: Croda Beauty offers the SphingoCare™ range of high-purity ceramides and sphingolipids for cosmetic applications. These biotechnology and plant-derived ingredients are produced through yeast fermentation, creating biomimetic structures identical to human skin lipids. The range includes pure ceramides, formulated ceramides, and sphingolipid complexes for comprehensive barrier repair solutions.
